About the only thing you can do is to ensure that the scopes of the
differe=
nt crawls do not overlap. This in itself can be tricky, depending on
how yo=
u are defining your crawl. If you post the details of your crawl you
might =
get some suggestion on how to split the scope.
 
Currently, Heritrix doesn'=
t allow for multiple machines working together and
sharing information. The=
re are plans to address this, but I believe that it
is still quite some tim=
e off.
 
- Kris

From: archive-crawler@yahoogrou=

I'm interested in trying to coordinate sev=
eral different crawlers
running heritrix.  I'm worried that the crawls will=
 overlap even if I
don't have the same seed files on each machine.

Any sug=
gestions on the right way to partition crawls among multiple
heritrix crawl=
ers?

  Thankx,
  Lou
